title: Convert multiple documents into different formats.
text:

Every day we offer FREE licensed software you’d have to buy otherwise. $99.99 Giveaway of the day — AKick Document Converter 1.9 Convert multiple documents into different formats. User rating: 66 (68%) 31 (32%) 12 comments 
AKick Document Converter 1.9 is available as a Giveaway of the day! You have limited time to download and install it. Download Now AKick Document Converter 1.9 Terms and conditions 
When it comes to converting a document in different formats then the need of a document converter is felt. PDF is normally considered the perfect readable format. But editing content on a document, it becomes necessary to get it converted to an editable format. The editable formats of a file are normally docx, ppt, xls, html and others. This is where the document converter software comes as a great assistant to convert files into desired forms. The program will help you to change a PDF file to docx, xls, jpg, xml and other forms. Also, the reverse can be done that involves converting editable forms to a non-editable form such as doc, ppt, gif, rtf to pdf. This software is also loaded with extra features that make it very interesting. 
NB: The license is valid for 1 year. System Requirements: 
All Windows OS; Microsoft Framework 4.0 installed; 1 GB RAM; 50MB Hard disk; Publisher:
